column8: Emphasis4
Description
Text
DialogueText
Text
The void whispers…..\r\nBrave Soldier, your journey begins….\r
We’ve done it! You successfully managed to save her from overheating! I’m sorry I lied.
I thought it would be motivational. Ironically, a flight that promises certain death also offers proof that space is inhabitable.
Warning! Strong Gravitational Force Has Been Detected .\n
I have been programmed to promise to provide you with good advice: For instance, that thing over there is going to kill you. Try to avoid it.\n
The Void Whispers… Laika, Do you feel pain?\r\n
Welcome. To Paradise. You have been saved from the scourge known as the human race.\n
Well, would you look at that. Another absent parent blaming nature for their child's misbehavior.
Oh Hi! A human.
Say you’re good at murder.
How about you murder those buttons and bars in the top right corner for me.
We’ve done it!....For now… please continue doing whatever it is you think you’re doing.
I will now present an amusing fact: Laika is breathing recycled air.
That’s right, the air in this ship is just carbon dioxide spiced up a little and pumped straight back into the chamber.
I thought that was amusing.

You’ve done it. [Subject name here] is the pride of [subject hometown here] You are the financial pinnacle of your community, your parents are very proud of you. As you can see, we are now approaching that thing I previously said would kill us. Good Job. Game Over. \r\n

The Void Whispers…
Relax…
Think of a tree.
Just Breathe.
That’s all a tree does.
Be Like A Tree
Breathe
And Know
It’s enough.
Only humans need more to be happy.
